import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import {works} from '../data' const Student = () => { const [activeModuleIndex, setActiveModuleIndex] = useState(0); const initialStudents = []; const initialCodeReviewers = []; const initialAdmins = []; const handleModuleClick = (index) => { setActiveModuleIndex(index); }; const [selectedSection, setSelectedSection] = useState(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('selectedSection')) || 'dashboard-section'); useEffect(()=>{ localStorage.setItem('selectedSection', JSON.stringify(selectedSection)); }, [selectedSection]) // Define a function to handle clicks on navigation links function handleNavigationClick(section) { setSelectedSection(section); } // Store state for students, code reviewers, and admins const [students, setStudents] = useState(initialStudents); const [codeReviewers, setCodeReviewers] = useState(initialCodeReviewers); const [admins, setAdmins] = useState(initialAdmins); // Handle form submission for adding a new student const handleAddStudent = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const name = event.target.elements.name.value; const email = event.target.elements.email.value; // Add the new student to the students array setStudents([...students, { name, email, progress: 0 }]); }; // Handle form submission for adding a new code reviewer const handleAddCodeReviewer = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const name = event.target.elements.name.value; const email = event.target.elements.email.value; // Add the new code reviewer to the codeReviewers array setCodeReviewers([...codeReviewers, { name, email, progress: 0 }]); }; // Handle form submission for adding a new admin const handleAddAdmin = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const name = event.target.elements.name.value; const email = event.target.elements.email.value; // Add the new admin to the admins array setAdmins([...admins, { name, email }]); }; return (

Here is your dedicated page to see your full attendance history and engagement history at Microverse!

If you will be out for longer than a day and a half for local or religious holidays, doctor's appointments, illnesses, internet problems, etc. do let us know about it as soon as possible.We expect you to let us, your partner and your Stand Up Team know about your absence well in advance, when possible, similar to any real-life work environment.

We use Zoom for systematically detecting absences. You can check here for a reminder about our Attendance Policy at Microverse.

If you see an absence on this page that you think is incorrect, please read this FAQ to troubleshoot what has happened and help you with next steps.
